detail.name: 3-Ply Stainless Steel Roaster with Rack, 2-Piece Carving Set & Carving Board
bulletText: Set includes: roasting pan, cooking rack, 2-piece carving set, cutting board
Roasting pan: unique, ergonomic, inverted handles to fit in the oven with ease; can fit up to a 25 lb. turkey; 3-ply stainless steel clad design for even heat distribution
Cooking rack: v-shaped; PFOA and PFOE free; eternal non-stick; helps cook food quicker and more evenly
Juice Well cutting board: naturally resistant to water, humidity and bacteria; large dual-sided cutting surface; built-in juice groove prevents messy spills
Dimensions: roasting pan 16.63"L x 13.75"W x 5.15"H; cooking rack 14.2"L x 11.38"W x 3.2"H; cutting board 8"L x 12"W x 0.75"H
Stainless steel, aluminum alloy, 18/10 stainless steel, acacia wood
Dishwasher safe; cutting board: hand wash

detail.name: Black Spanish Turkey
detail.description: Heritage Black is a distinguished breed, one of the first domesticated turkeys to be developed from Native American stock, believed to be the same breed served at the first Thanksgiving feast. Sourced from a small family farm in North Carolina where they have continuous outdoor access and protection from harmful elements.  Unstuffed and ready to cook.
bulletText: Food and beverage items are not eligible for return or exchange.

detail.name: Signature Blends, Set of 18
bulletText: A collection of delicious gourmet blends that take your spice collection beyond the basics

Includes cowboy steak rub, garlic herb rub, Cajun seasoning, Tuscan seasoning, cracked coriander pepper rub, berbere, chaat masala, tandoori masala, green za'atar, ras el hanout, harissa, Chinese five spice, herbs de provence,
honey herb rub, Modena balsamic rub, mustard tarragon seasoning, lemon pepper seasoning, everything bagel seasoning
Contains celery, mustard, sesame and trace amounts of wheat
Food and beverage items are not eligible for return or exchange.

data.productName: Baccarat Vega Flutissimo Champagne Flute, Set of 2

detail.name: Sparkling Wine Preservation System
detail.description: Preserve the crisp flavor and effervescence of your favorite sparkling wines for up to four weeks with the Coravin Sparkling Wine Preservation System. The universal Sparkling Stopper locks securely on virtually any bottle, while the Sparkling Charger delivers pure CO2 that blankets the remaining sparkling wine, ensuring the bottle remains fresh for the next pour. When you are ready for that next glass of bubbly, simply remove the Stopper to pour. Now there's no reason to wait for a special occasion to enjoy a glass of champagne, prosecco, cava or any other sparkling wine.
bulletText: System made in China; capsules made in Austria
Offical Preservation Partner of Moët Hennessy Champagnes

This item is part of Happy Together Again, our latest pop-up dedicated to the fine art of entertaining, curated by Giada De Laurentiis, Italian chef, restaurateur, TV personality, and founder of Giadzy.
System & stoppers: injection molded plastic/stainless steel/elastomers; capsules: injection molded plastic/steel/elastomers
